titlestmt.titleproper:
Guide to the Hopper Striker Mott Papers
1866-1930
MS 3114
titlestmt.author: Elise Winks

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-12 14:17:05 -0400.

physdesc.extent: in 21 volumes, 17 document boxes, 10 flat boxes

did.abstract: Records from author Hopper Striker Mott including correspondence, genealogical research, legal documents, newspaper clippings, and scrapbook pages on the Charlier Institute.
did.langmaterial: The documents in the collection are in English.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: The collection should be cited as: Hopper Striker Mott Papers, MS 3114, New-York Historical Society.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The collection is not processed. As part of a project conducted in 2019-20, archivist Elise Winks performed a high level survey of the collection and described it broadly in this preliminary finding aid.
